name: ConflictCraft
description: Defend and attack at same time. In this strategy game you need to capture as many bases as you can. Different type of bases - anti-air guns, turrets, radio tower to call for backup, nuclear silos. 3 different type of units - tanks, apaches and dropships - will be at your disposal.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Vista, or XP Service Pack 3 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or higher Storage: 100 MB available space
